title: Fragment from Relief of a Nobleman
description:
Fragment of limestone relief. In raised relief, head of man facing right, wearing striated wig. At extreme right, portion of column of hieroglyphs in raised relief seemingly recording name of man. Inscription is too incomplete to be read.

Condition: Assembled from several fragments. Nose chipped. No trace of paint.
credit_line: Gift of the Ernest Erickson Foundation, Inc.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
